title: Cleaning My Room
description: Cleaning My Room is the story of one little boy and his very messy room. After his mom instructs him to clean up the mess, the boy asks for the reader's help to locate and sort various objects in his room. Lively illustrations and engaging text support emerging readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify story elements including characters, plot, and setting in this humorous story.
meta: clothes, find, help, pile, room, sort
Story Elements : Identify characters, setting, and plot
Short Vowels : Discriminate short vowel /e/ sound
Question Marks : Recognize and use question marks
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency words can, me, my, you

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
